findings.rationale: The five-year duration may be insufficient for certain sensitive information, potentially allowing for misuse post-agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: Allowing injunctive relief without posting a bond may expose the Receiving Party to significant risks without a safeguard.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment may hinder business flexibility and complicate future transactions or ownership changes.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
